channel.title: Cuztomize for Summer 2018
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I've seen many actual games launching some updates about summer 2018 as we're early august. I would like to suggest some "crazy" ideas to add more customization to the game.
New armors : - a guy with straw hat & black hair, wearing a shirt summer opened, a tropical short blue/green colored with palm trees, and some colored flipflops. - a girl wearing bikini (in 2 pieces) with black sunglasses, a flowery necklace (flowers are white and red like if we were in hawaii) and some colored flipflops. - an other guy with blond hair, half-naked in top and red swimsuit + white flipflops (like if he were coming from Malibu). - an other girl with this time a bodysuit (in 1 piece) wearing a bath towel around her waist like a long skirt and some colored flipflops.
New weapons : - a beach ball that the player will smash on the exe player's head to break his head/neck. - a water gun to drown the exe player's face. - a super jump/high kick with both feets like if the player is gonna jump over the exe player's body & slide with it as what he will do with a surfboard on a wave. - a beach umbrella that a player will open and swirl in the exe player direction and makes him fly with it. - a summer fan that the player will use to cut the neck of the exe player like a ninja.
New emotes : - it's so hot, so the player is sweating and trying to make some hands movements to refresh his face/body. - the player grab a beach ball from the back and hit it on the top to make it disappear on the screen.
If you had other ideas i'll take it but i find myself that it would be fun at least to have some of them in real.
